Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
{STR_leaderName} has committed atrocities against the local population!

All entries with TITLE in the TEXT ID column are the title in the game for that casus belli. These entries are used in lists, etc. to show the actions of players and the consequences of these actions.
This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is plotting to take over the planet!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} has started constructing a Doomsday Weapon!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is depleting the planet’s natural resources!
{STR_leaderName}正耗尽整个星球的自然资源！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is heavily polluting the planet with toxic emissions!
{STR_leaderName}释放的剧毒排放物正对星球造成严重污染！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is hollowing out the planet with huge excavations!
{STR_leaderName}正大肆进行挖掘，企图掏空整个星球！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is employing frontier policies that infringe on our borders!
{STR_leaderName}正施行侵犯我方边境利益的边境政策！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is employing aggressive military stratagies near our lands!
{STR_leaderName}正在我方领土附近采取侵略性军事战略！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is seeking to destroy races that do not adhere to Star Union doctrine!
{STR_leaderName}正试图消灭不遵守星际联盟教义的种族！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is building ghastly hive-like structures that horrify our people!
{STR_leaderName}正建造恐怖的蜂巢形建筑，我们的居民受到了惊吓！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is using psionic powers to control humanoid life!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is seeking the destruction of the remnants of the Star Union!
{STR_leaderName}正试图摧毁星际联盟的残存势力！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is using subterfuge to undermine our colony for their own goals!
{STR_leaderName}正利用用诡计削弱我方殖民地以实现自身目的！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} plans to monopolize the planet’s economy through the control of trade!
{STR_leaderName}计划通过贸易控制垄断星球经济！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is using duplicity to destroy our relations with other colonies!
{STR_leaderName}正使用欺诈手段破坏我们与其他殖民地的关系！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is recycling body parts taken from our fallen brothers and sisters!
{STR_leaderName}正在回收我们阵亡的兄弟姐妹们的身体部位！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is splicing the DNA of kidnapped citizens!
{STR_leaderName}正在拼接被绑架市民的 DNA！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is trying to disfigure our people into cybernetic abominations!
{STR_leaderName}正试图将我们的居民改造成丑陋的神经机械怪物！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is mutilating the genetic code of indigenous life!
{STR_leaderName}正破坏本土生物的基因序列！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is deploying guerilla tactics to ambush local convoys!
{STR_leaderName}正部署游击战术伏击当地车队！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is terraforming the planet for their own ends!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is actively working to make sure the Star Union is not revived!
{STR_leaderName}正不遗余力地确保星际联盟不会再次崛起！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is blocking Vanguard expeditions and throttling future explorations!
{STR_leaderName}正在阻止先锋远征及未来的探索！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} was involved in the collapse of the Star Union!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is disregarding the planet’s ecosystem and continues their harmful environmental policies!
{STR_leaderName}正无视星球的生态系统并继续施行对环境有害的政策！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is actively hunting vital indigenous species!
{STR_leaderName}正大肆猎杀重要的本土物种！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName} is blocking full planetary terraforming protocols, denying the evolution of our race!
{STR_leaderName}正在阻碍星球整体改造协议，并且拒绝接受我们的种族进化！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

{STR_leaderName}正在改造星球并破坏我们种族生存所需的资源！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
